'''Walter''' is one of [[Chandler Bing|Chandler's]] co-workers. He briefly appears in "[[The One Where Emma Cries]]". 

During a business meeting at his job, Chandler is very tired and almost falls asleep. Walter is the colleague seating to his left side, and Chandler dozes off towards Walter. 

The actor playing Walter doesn't say a line in the episode and is not credited.
